data.title: INDIA'S WORLD RECORDS
data.meta_description:
Regd. Under Indian Trusts Act 1882. Regd. Also registered under MSME, Govt. Of India
 ISO 9001 : 2015  Certified organisation
data.text:
The Record for the maximum number of flower pots, potted with winter flowers

decorating a single corporate venue with the theme of Biodiversity has been set by

TATA Motors Ltd, Jamshedpur, Jharkhand on 3rd March, 2024 to celebrate the

occasion of Founder’s Day. The venue was decorated with a wide range of real exotic

flower pots, numbering around 1.77 lakhs of varying sizes from 6 to 12 inches,

spanning a total length of approximately 800 meters and width varying between 4 to

12 meters approximately.

Record Holder - Shri Bhagwandas Chunilal Sugandhi

Born On – 16/12/1940, From Pune, Maharashtra, India.

The record of maximum spiritual mantras written by an individual belongs To Shri Bhagwandas Chunilal Sugandhi of Pune, Maharashtra, India. He has written holy mantras of shrimad Bhagavad Gita, hindu vedic mantras and Jain holy mantras using total 24 registers (total 7049 pages) which includes 7610840 letters 3258325 words. He started writing on

25.10.2017 and completed on 23.06.2023. Everyday he used to write the holy mantras on resgister at his residence between 10:30 pm to 1:30 am.

RECORD HOLDER -

Sivamithra. S

D/O – Mr. Sivaprasad S & Mrs. Meera V.M

Born On – 02/08/2019, From Palakkad, Kerala, India.

The record of youngest super talented kid with remarkable memory belongs To Sivamithra.

S of Palakkad, Kerala, India. She has successfully recited names of all the the President of

India, names of all the Prime Minister of India since independenc, names of all the Chief

Minister of Kerala, names of all the Indian States, District of Kerala States, fundamental

rights of Indian Contitutions, all the union territories of India, all the planet of our solar

system, national parks of Kerala, full form of all the government services and instituions of

India, names of 44 rivers of Kerala, 5 oceans andd 7 continents, 7 wonders of the world, 11

biggest dams in india. She also recited number 1-10 in 10 different languages such as Hindi,

English, Malayalam, Tamil, Kannada, Thulu, Telegu, Sanskrit, Marathi and Bengali, Months

of the year, days of the week, navarasagal, Malayalam kavikal, rainbow colours. The Record

has been approved on 5th June 2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Dhyan Siva. S

S/O – Mr. Sivaprasad S & Mrs. Meera V.M

Born On – 12/01/2018, From Palakkad, Kerala, India.

The record of youngest super talented kid with remarkable memory belongs To Dhyan Siva. S of Palakkad, Kerala, India. He has successfully recited names of all the the President of

India, names of all the Prime Minister of India since independenc, names of all the Chief

Minister of Kerala, names of all the Indian States, District of Kerala States, fundamental

rights of Indian Contitutions, all the union territories of India, all the planet of our solar

system, national parks of Kerala, full form of all the government services and instituions of

India, names of 44 rivers of Kerala, 5 oceans andd 7 continents, 7 wonders of the world, 11

biggest dams in india. He also recited number 1-10 in 10 different languages such as Hindi,

English, Malayalam, Tamil, Kannada, Thulu, Telegu, Sanskrit, Marathi and Bengali, Months

of the year, days of the week, navarasagal, Malayalam kavikal, rainbow colours. The Record

has been approved on 5th June 2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Shaik Nayeem Pasha & Motapothula Uday Naga Bhushanam

From Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, India.

The Record of travelling all UNESCO's world heritage sites historical landmarks

printed on Indian currency notes of all denominations belongs To Shaik Nayeem

Pasha & Motapothula Uday Naga Bhushanam of Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, India.

They have successfully visited to all the locations that are printed on Indian currency

notes and known as UNESCO's World Heritage Sites such as Sun Temple, Konark,

Odisha (printed on 10 rupees note), Ellora Caves, Aurangabad (printed on 20 rupees

note), Stone Chariot of Hampi, Karnakata (printed on 50 rupees note), Rani Ki Vav,

Gujarat (printed on 100 rupees note), Sanchi Stupa, Madhya Pradesh (printed on 200

rupees note), Red Fort, Delhi, (printed on 500 rs note). They have started the trip to

cover all these heritage sites on 19th April 2024 and completed on 28th April 2024

RECORD HOLDER -

Siddharth Aryan Pandey

S/O. Mr. Shiv jyoti S. pandey & Mrs. Shveta pandey

Born On – 07/05/2021, From Jammu and Kashmir, India.

He successfully recognised National symbols of India, Indian Currency notes of

different denominations such as ₹1, ₹2, ₹5, ₹10, ₹50, ₹100 and ₹200 notes, he

also performs on actions words, recite shlokas, and chants Gayatri mantra and

recites rhymes. He completed recitation of english Alphabet (A-Z) in just 10

seconds, recitation of english alphabet phonics within 2 minutes, recited hindi

varanmala within 3 minutes, counted numbers (1-10) within 10 seconds,

identified 30 Birds, 14 parts of body, 11 Colors, 7 days of week within 10 seconds,

22 farm and pet animals, 11 Food, 22 Fruits in 1minute 18 seconds , 22

vegetables, around 18 passion, 10 shapes identified within 30 seconds, 22

vehicles within 1 minute 15 seconds. He can also identify 12 Wild animals, 16

aquatic animals, 11 Insects within 1 minute. He also answered about sound of

animals and birds.

RECORD HOLDER -

Rohit Garg

S/O. Mr. Ajay Garg & Mrs. Ekta Garg

Born On – 21/10/1998, From Delhi, India.

The record of longest poetry e-book published by an author belongs to

Rohit Garg of Delhi, India. The name of the e-book is ECHOES OF

VALKMIKI’S EPIC: A POETIC JOURNEY THROUGH THE

RAMAYANA. The book has been published in english language having

total 1,40,000 words. The achievement is recorded on 11th March 2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Tangirala Abhirama Srihas

S/O. Mr. Tangirala Hanumath sai santosh & Mrs. Tangirala Bhargavi

Born On – 16/04/2023, From Hyderabad , Telangana, India.

The Record of youngest super talent with a remarkable recognising skills

belongs to Tangirala Abhirama Srihas of Hyderabad , Telangana, India.

At the age of 10 months he identified different objects such as sketch pens, water bottles, many

electrical and electronic gadgets such as washing machine, television, fan,

clock, Alexa etc. He also responded to the instructions given to him and

acted correctly to all the instructions.

RECORD HOLDER -

Shruti Ganesh Gawade

D/O. Mr. Ganesh Gawade

Born On – 30/07/1995, From Pune, Maharashtra, India.

The Record of biggest micrographic portrait rangoli of Shree Ram belongs to Shruti

Ganesh Gawade of Pune, Maharashtra, India. In this artwork she has written the

name of Lord Ram as Shree Ram for 220124 times. Size of the rangoli is 2400 square

ft. (60 feet X 40 feet). She has used red, yellow, orange, black, brown, blue, white

shades of rangoli colours to complete the artwork and the total quantity of rangoli

colours that has been used to create this artwork is 510 kgs. She took total 21 hours to

complete the artwork. The attempt was successfully completed on 20th January 2024

RECORD HOLDER -

Preyansh Dipesh Nagar

S/O. Mr. Dipesh Punamchand Nagar & Mrs. Sweta Nagar

Born On – 06/07/2022, From Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India.

The Record of Youngest Super Talent with Remarkable Memory belongs

to Preyansh Dipesh Nagar of Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. At the age of 1.5

years he has successfully identified letters of english alphabets, alphabet

phonics, fruits and dry fruits, vegetables, parts of the body, vehicles,

animals, birds etc. He also identified different Utensils and household

items, differentiated between packets of milk, buttermilk and curd. The

attempt was taken on 20th February 2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Aniruddha Saxena

S/O. Dr. Anurag Saxena & Dr. Shivani Saxena

Born On – 08/02/2011, From Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India.

The Record of Youngest Talent With A Remarkable Mental Maths Skill

belongs to Aniruddha Saxena of Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India. He

successfully doubled numbers sequentially from a single digit and can

double its values till billions, mentally without using pen, paper and

calculator. He also multiplied 5 digit numbers mentally with 2, 4, 8, 16, 32,

64, 128 and answered correctly. The Record attempt was taken on 2 / 02 /

2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Khushi

D/O. Mr. Virupaksha Gouda & Mrs. Shivaleela

Born On – 15/07/2018, From Raichur, Karnataka, India.

The certificate of super talented kid belongs to Khushi of Raichur, Karnataka,

India. She was able to answered questions about our galaxy and planets within

the universe. She also possess knowledge of various dance forms of India and

the basics of Indian general knowledge. She could also recalled famous scientist

and their inventions, various specialisation of doctors and locations of the

monument across the world. The record attempt was taken on 9th March 2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Shivali Ganesh Kore

D/O. Mr. Ganesh and Mrs. Sonali Kore

Born On – 21/10/2022, From Maharashtra, India.

The Record of youngest super talent with a remarkable recognising skills belongs to

Shivali Ganesh Kore of Maharashtra, India. She successfully identified 7 parts of the

body, 18 objects such as bat, ball, comb, pillow, glass, spoon, hair oil bottle, cotton,

cloths etc. She also identified electronic gadgets such as television, laptop, remote,

mobile phone etc. She performed prayer, unfolded wroughly folded cloths and folded

them properly, climbed stairs. She has recognised all family members by relationship

to herself. She also pickedup wrongly placed things and put them on a proper place.

The record attempt was taken on 5th February 2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Manikkuttan Gs

S/O. Mr. Govindan Nadar & Mrs. Sakunthala

Born On – 17/05/1973, From Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India.

The Record of first individual to complete the longest solo self driving trip

belongs to Manikkuttan Gs of Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India. He has

completed total 69207 Km solo self driving trip covering different locations

all across India by Mahindra XUV 500 (2015 Model) within 99 days. He

started his trip from Trivendrum, Kerala on 13th August 2023 (7:20 Am)

and completed by reaching to the same place - Trivendrum on 19th

November 2023 (6:00 Pm).

RECORD HOLDER -

Samya Panchal

D/O. Mr. Maulik Panchal

Born On – 16/04/2012, From Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India.

The Record of youngest and fastest Indian girl to complete Chadar Trek

within a shortest time belongs to Samya Panchal of Ahmedabad, Gujarat,

India. Chadar trek – A frozen river trek over the frozen Zanskar river lies

in the Indian union territory of Ladakh. At the age of 11 years 9 months

and 3 days she completed it. She started on 17th January, 2024 and

successfully completed on 19th January, 2024.

RECORD HOLDER -

Ms. Jaishnavi Vigneswaran

D/O. Dr. D. Vigneswaran & Dr. Vadakasi

Born On – 27/03/2022, From Madurai, India.

The Record of Youngest Super Talented Kid belongs to Ms. Jaishnavi

Vigneswaran of Madurai, India. She successfully recited 6 Thirukkurals, 2

Tamil rhymes and 3 English rhymes. She also identified 25 fruits, 20

animals, 30 vegetables, 9 shapes, 4 colours, 12 months of the year, 7 days

of the week and household things. She also imitated sound of 6 animals

and 12 relationship with their names.

RECORD HOLDER -

Thanshika Shasti RC

D.O.B. – 11/04/2021, D/O. Mr. Raghavendra H S &

Mrs. Chandana B S

From Bangalore, Karnataka, India.

At 1 year old, she is able to recite alphabets and abbreviations, count

numerals, identify colours, name national symbols, identify animals,

fruits, vegetables and shapes. Plus, she can recite 10 to 15 rhymes,

compare the shadows of the animals. Skilled at both playing online

video games and solving puzzle, mimics the sounds of animals. Engages

in all outdoor and indoor games with enthusiasm.

RECORD HOLDER-

Akshay Balkrishna Gopal

S/O Mr. Balkrishna Venugopal & Mrs. Leena Balkrishna Gopal

Born on 25Th February 2003 From Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

Record of “ belongs to

Akshay Balkrishna Gopal of Mumbai. He has participated in various social work activities such as Woman Empowerment, Animal protection & rescue, Acid attack, Self-defence, Food and grain donation, helping children of Orphanages etc. We wish him all the very best for all his future projects.

Sachin Drupada Yashwant Shigwan

Born On – 11/02/1983, S/O. Mrs. Drupada Yashwant Shigwan

From Andheri (E), Maharashtra, India.

Over a decade, he has contributed to the improvement of rural

underprivileged people. Green India Initiative, the organisation he

created, has developed 556 villages, and he has personally worked in

501 villages pan India. He has received numerous honor's for his

contributions to the design of numerous creative and sustainable

solar energy projects for rural development.

Ashutosh Shandilya - World Record Holder

Born On – 01/12/1979, S/O. Mr. P. C. Sharma & Mrs. Poonam Sharma

From Jhansi, Uttar Pradesh, India.

On a canvas measuring 12 inches x 24 inches, he painted 108 eyes to

depict a human at various stages of life. His works of art describe a

person's youth, middle age, and old age. He took 2 months to complete

his painting.

RECORD HOLDER- Bala Pradyumna Pratyush Reddy Alla

Born On – 29/04/2013, S/O. Mr. Alla Pradeep Kumar & Mrs. Alla Sunitha

From Hyderabad, Telangana, India.

He is the youngest kid who is knowledgeable about the heart's position,

operation, and function, as well as the human brain and its many

elements. He is able to provide information on the functions of many

organs, such as the kidney, bones, lungs, diaphragm, nose, ear, and teeth.

He is well knowledgeable about the many types of snakes. He has also

acquired knowledge of the universe.

RECORD HOLDER-Ayzan Laiq Bin Ajmal

Born On – 02/10/2021, S/O. Mr. Ajmal Abdul Rasheed & Mrs. Ameena S Ramley

From Kollam, Kerala, India.

He is the youngest to have memorised and remembered numerous household items,

animal’s name & their sounds, birds, vegetables, fruits, toys name, vehicles, nursery

rhymes, name of famous personalities like The honourable Prime Minister of India,

name of The honourable Chief Minister of Kerala, Kamala Surayya and Mahatma

Gandhi ji. He says no to chocolate, playing mobile and watching cartoons etc. He

also identified parts of body, rules to be followed in metro and buses in Dubai. He

also speaks in full sentence, and talks about good and bad touch, answered few

General Knowledge questions. He recalled the names of places where his relatives live.
